hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#cd /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/ #for eol-archive #cd /var/www/html/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/ #folder not found | for Mac Studio PHP 8.2 cd /Volumes/Crucial_4TB/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/ #for Mac Studio PHP 8.2
[ ! -d "Country_checklists" ] && mkdir Country_checklists #creates folder [Country_checklists] if it does not exist yet. cd Country_checklists ls -lt Country_checklists_DwCA.zip #list file [ -e Country_checklists_DwCA.zip ] && rm Country_checklists_DwCA.zip #removes existing Country_checklists_DwCA.zip if exists. bash /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors/files/Country_checklists/run_Country_checklists.sh #downloads a new Country_checklists_DwCA.zip ls -lt Country_checklists_DwCA.zip #list file
